review.title: “Administrative Assistant”
review.pros: Pros – I have been working for Ms. Sen for 3 years now and every day I love coming to work because of how our work environment is. We are each other’s work family and love it! Our boss has an amazing work ethic, and I feel like she works over and beyond for each and every client of ours. She not only is a good attorney but a wonderful boss.
review.cons: Cons – No downside working for Law offices of Dakshini R. Sen P.C.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
